Name: LU 275 - Landmarks, 4312 2nd Ave, Brooklyn (C 150188 PCK)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 150188 PCK (L.U. No. 275), a site selection and acquisition of property located at 4312 2nd Avenue (Block 726, Lot 1), Borough of Brooklyn, for use as a warehouse and storage facility.

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\froman\fprq2\fcharset2 Symbol;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
By Council Members Greenfield and Koo\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on August 7, 2015 its decision dated August 5, 2015 (the "Decision") on the application submitted pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter by the New York City Police Department (NYPD) and the New York City Department of Citywide Administrative Services (DCAS) for site selection and acquisition of property located at 4312 2nd Avenue (Block 726, Lot 1), Community District 7, Borough of Brooklyn (the "Site"), for use as warehouse and storage facility (ULURP No. C 150188 PCK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(3) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on September 8, 2015;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360       \tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\expndtw0\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues including the negative declaration (CEQR No. 15NYP001K) issued on February 17, 2015 (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf1\expndtw-5 The Council finds that the action described herein will have \expndtw-4 no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\cf0\expndtw0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx720\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d of the New York City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 150188 PCK, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision for the site selection and acquisition of the Site for use as NYPD warehouse and storage facility.\expndtw-3\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sl240\slmult0\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\tx9360\par
\par
\par
Adopted.\par
\par
